playercard_special_rules: Action: Discard Beorning Beekeeper from play to deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area.
Response: After êomund leaves play ready all Rohan characters in play.
Action: Spend 1 Lore Resource to give Longbeard Map-Maker +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Defense.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Warning to another hero.

Attach to an ally.
Action: Discard Born Aloft from play to return attached ally to its owners hand.
Attach to a character. Attached character gains the Rohan trait.

Attach to Lore character.
While attached character is defending cancel any shadow effects on cards dealt to the attacking enemy.

Attach to a hero. 
Attached hero gains a Lore resource icon.
Action: Each player returns the topmost attachment card from his discard pile to his hand.
Winged Guardian cannot have restricted attachments. Forced: After an attack in which Winged Guardian defends resolves pay 1 Tactics resource or discard Winged Guardian from play.
Action: Discard Westfold Horse-Breaker to choose and ready a hero.
Response: After you play Rivendell Minstrel from your hand search your deck for 1 Song card and add it to your hand.  Shuffle your deck.
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Attack. Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Mark to another hero.
Attach to a hero.Attached hero gains a Leadership resource icon.
Action: Each player draws 1 card.
Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Eagle cards and add them to your hand.  Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any 1 Rohan ally card and add it to your hand.  Then shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

Response: After a location is revealed from the encounter deck immediately travel to that location without resolving its Travel effect.  If another location is currently active return it to the staging area.

Landroval cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After a hero card is destroyed return Landroval to his owners hand to put that hero back into play with 1 damage token on it. [Limit once per game.]

While committed to a quest Escort from Edoras gets +2 Willpower.
Forced: After resolving a quest to which Escort from Edoras was committed discard Escort from Edoras from play.

Radagast collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Creature cards played from your hand. 
Action: Spend X resources from Radagasts pool to heal X wounds on any 1 Creature.

Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Willpower.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Quest to another hero.

Attach to a location.
Response: After attached location is explored the first player draws 3 cards.
Action: Move any number of resource tokens from a Leadership heros resource pool to any other heros resource pool.
Response: After an ally is destroyed exhaust 1 Eagle character to move that ally from the discard pile to its owners hand.
Action: Move any number of damage from one enemy to another.

If each of your heroes has a printed [Tactics] resource icon Knight of Minas Tirith gains: Response: After Knight of Minas Tirith enters play choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage that enemy and exhaust Knight of Minas Tirith to declare it as attacker [and resolve its attack] against that enemy.
Pelargir Shipwright gets +1 [Willpower] for each hero you control with a printed [Spirit] resource icon.

Attach to a Gondor ally.
Attached ally gains the Outlands trait.

Attach to a Gondor or Dunedain hero.
Action: Spend 1 resource from attached heros resource pool to give attached hero +1 [Attack] for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. [Limit once per phase.]

Attach to a [Spirit] Hero.
Reduce the cost to play Map of Earnil by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Spirit] resource icon.
Action: Discard Map of Earnil to play any [Spirit] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then place that event on the bottom of your deck.

Attach to a Ranger character. Restricted.
Action: Exhaust Ranger Bow and attached character to deal 1 damage to an enemy in the staging area.

Play only if you control at least 1 Ranger character.
Action: Deal 3 damage to an enemy with at least 1 Trap card attached to it.

Attach to a Noble hero.
Planning Action: Exhaust Palantir and attached hero to name a card type and look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that matches the named type draw a card. For each of those cards that does not match the named type raise your threat by 2.
Action: Return X Outlands allies from your discard pile to your hand.
Action: Exhaust Faramir to choose a player. Each character controlled by that player gets +1 Willpower until end of the phase.
Response: After Son of Arnor enters play choose an enemy card in the staging area or currently engaged with another player. Engage that enemy.
Response: After Snowbourn Scout enters play choose a location. Place 1 progress token on that location.
Response: After Longbeard Orc Slayer enters play deal 1 damage to each Orc enemy in play.
Response: After a Dwarf hero you control leaves play put Brok Ironfist into play from your hand.
Response: After Gondorian Spearman is declared as a defender deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.
Action: Beorn gains +5 Attack until the end of the phase. At the end of that phase in which you trigger this effect shuffle Beorn back into your deck. [Limit once per round.]
Action: Reduce your threat by 3 to give control of Wandering Took to another player. Raise that players threat by 3.
Response: After Lorien Guide commits to a quest place 1 progress token on the active location.
Response: After Northern Tracker commits to a quest place 1 progress token on each location in the staging area.
Action: Exhaust Daughter of the Nimrodel to heal up to 2 damage on any 1 hero.
Response: After you play Erebor Hammersmith return the topmost attachment in any players discard pile to his hand.
Action: Exhaust Henemarth Riversong to look at the top card of the encounter deck.
Response: After Miner of the Iron Hills enters play choose and discard 1 Condition attachment from play.
Action: Exhaust GlÇowine to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

At the end of the round discard Gandalf from play.
Response: After Gandalf enters play [choose 1]: draw 3 cards deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play or reduce your threat by 5.
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Gondor trait. Action: Exhaust Steward of Gondor to add 2 resources to attached heros resource pool.
Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gains +2 Willpower. If attached hero is Aragorn he also gains a Spirit resource icon.
Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gets +1 Attack when attacking an Orc. Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy place 1 progress token on the current quest.
Attach to hero. Restricted. Attached hero gets +4 Hit Points.
Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gains +1 Attack. [+2 Attack instead if attached hero is a Dwarf.]
Attach to a hero. Restricted. Response: After a character leaves play add 1 resource to attached heros pool.
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Willpower.
Attach to a location. Attached location gets -1 Threat.
Attach to a hero. Action: Exhaust Unexpected Courage to ready attached hero.
Attach to an enemy engaged with a player. Attached enemy cannot attack.
Attach to a hero. Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached hero +1 Defense or +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gets -1 Willpower. Response: Exhaust Dark Knowledge to look at 1 shadow card that was just dealt to an enemy attacking you.

Attach to a character.
Action: Exhaust Self Preservation to heal 2 points of damage from attached character.
Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.
Action: Exhaust 1 hero you control to choose and ready a different hero.
Action: Until the end of the phase all characters get +1 Attack. All Gondor characters also get +1 Defense until the end of the phase.
Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase if that ally is still in play return it to your hand.
Response: After an ally card leaves play that cards controller draws 2 cards.
Action: Ready all character cards in play.
Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase that character gains +1 Attack and +1 Defense.
Action: Exhaust a character you control with the ranged keyword to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.
Combat Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack this phase.
Action: Exhaust a character you control to immediately declare it as an attacker [and resolve this attack] against any eligible enemy target.
You must use resources from 3 different heroes pools to pay for this card. Action: Choose a player. That players engaged enemies do not attack this phase.
Response: After a character is declared as a defender deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.
Action: Choose a player. That player may declare any number of his eligible characters as defenders against each enemy attacking him this phase.
Action: Reduce one players threat by 6 or reduce each players threat by 2.
Response: After you travel to a location exhaust a Spirit character to place 2 progress tokens on that location.
Response: Cancel a shadow effect just triggered during combat.
Action: Choose a player. Shuffle that players discard pile back into his deck.
Response: Cancel the when revealed effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.
Action: Choose an ally with a printed cost of X in any players discard pile. Put that ally into play under your control. [The chosen ally can belong to any sphere of influence.]
Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. Return that enemy to the staging area.
Action: Return 1 Spirit card from your discard pile to your hand.
Action: Choose a hero in any players discard pile. Put that card into play under its owners control.
Action: Choose a character. Heal all damage from that character.
Action: Choose a player. That player draws 3 cards.
Quest Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase that enemy does not contribute its Threat.
Quest Action: Choose a location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase that location does not contribute its Threat.
Action: Look at the top X cards of any players deck add 1 of those cards to its owners hand and return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.
Action: Choose a player. Heal all damage on each hero controlled by that player.

Denethor gets -1 [Willpower] for each damaged hero you control.
Discard Denethor if his [Willpower] is 0 or less.

Response: After and encounter card with surge is revealed discard Minas Tirith Lampwright to name enemy location or treachery. If the next encounter card revealed is the named type discard it without resolving its effects.
Response: After Ithilien Archer attacks and damages an enemy return that enemy to the staging area.

Attach to a Gondor or Outlands hero.
If each hero you control has a printed [Leadership] resource icon Lord of Morthond gains Response: After you play a [Lore] [Spirit] or [Tactics] ally draw one card.

Attach to a [Tactics] hero.
Reduce the cost to play Book of Eldacar by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Tactics] resource icon.
Action: Discard Book of Eldacar to play any [Tactics] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then place that event on the bottom of your deck.

Play Ithilien Pit into the staging area unattached.
If unattached attach Ithilien Pit to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
Any character may choose attached enemy as the target of an attack.
Response: Cancel up to 2 points of damage just dealt to a Gondor character.

Response: After a Hobbit hero you control exhausts to defend an attack choose another enemy engaged with you and reveal the attacking enemys shadow card. If that shadow card has no shadow effect resolve this enemys attack against the chosen enemy. If that shadow card has a shadow effect resolve this attack as normal.

Play only if each of your heroes is a Hobbit.
Combat Action: Enemies engaged with you do not attack this phase. You cannot declare attacks this phase.

Response: After Longbeard Elder commits to a quest look at the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a location place 1 progress token on the current quest. Otherwise Longbeard Elder gets -1 [Willpower] until the end of the phase.
Trollshaw Scout does not exhaust to attack. Forced: After Trollshaw Scout attacks either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.
Action: Exhaust Imladris Stargazer to choose a player. That player looks at the top 5 cards of his deck and then returns them to the top of his deck in any order.
Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a location. Heroes do not exhaust to attack defend or commit to a quest while attached location is the active location.
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero. Attached hero does not exhaust to commit to a quest.
Attach to a [Lore] hero. Action: Discard Healing Herbs and exhaust attached hero to heal all damage on 1 character.
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero. Action: Exhaust Asfaloth to place 1 progress token on any location. [2 tokens instead if attached hero is Glorfindel.
Response: After a Dwarf deals X damage to an enemy during combat deal and additional X damage to that enemy. [Limit once per phase.]
Action: Draw 2 cards. Then discard 1 card from your hand.
Action: Exhaust Errand-rider to move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another heros resource pool.
Lower the cost to play Citadel Custodian by 1 for each Gondor ally in play.
Action: Discard Damrod from play to lower your threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.
Response: After you play Hunter of Lamedon from your hand reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Outlands card add it to your hand. Otherwise discard it.
Action: Exhaust Ithilien Tracker to lower the Threat of the next enemy added to the staging area to 0 until the end of the phase.

Action: Exhaust Master of Lore to name a card type. Lower the cost for you to play [Lore] cards of that type by 1 until the end of the phase [to a minimum of 1].

Errata: Action: Exhaust Master of Lore to name a card type. Lower the cost for you to play the next [Lore] card of that type by 1 until the end of the phase [to a 
minimum of 1].
Response: After Envy of Pelargir enters play add 1 resource to a Gondor or Noble heros resource pool.

Attach to a Tactics character. Restricted.
Limit 1 per character.
Response: After attached character is declared as a defender deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

Attach to a Gondor of Dunedain hero.
Action: Spend 1 resource from attached heros resource pool to give attached hero +1 [Defense] for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. [Limit once per phase]

Play Ranger Spikes into the staging area unattached.
If unattached attach Ranger Spikes to the next elegible enemy that enters the staging area.
Players do not make engagement checks against attached enemy. Attached enemy gets -2 [Threat].
Action: Until the end of the phase each Gondor card in play gains the Rohan trait and each Rohan card in play gains the Gondor trait.
Action: Choose a Gondor hero. Add 1 resource to that heros resource pool.
Action: Ready a defending Gondor character. That character gets +1 [Defense] until the end of the phase.
Action: All characters get +2 [Defense] and do not exhaust to defend until the end of the round.
Response: After a location leaves play as an explored location return it to the top of the encounter deck.
Veteran of Nanduhirion enters play with 1 damage on it.

Action: Exhaust Zigil Miner and name a number to discard the top 2 cards of your deck.  If at least one of those cards has a cost equal to the named number choose a hero you control.  That hero adds resources to his resource pool equal to the named number.

Erebor Record Keeper cannot attack or defend.
Action: Exhaust Erebor Record Keeper and pay 1 Lore resource to choose and ready a Dwarf character.
Attach to a Dwarf hero. Action: Exhaust Narvis Belt to give attached hero a resource icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

Attach to a Dwarf character.  Restricted. Attached character gets +1 Attack. 
Response: After attached character attacks deal 1 damage to the defending enemy.
Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character. Limit 1 Boots from Erebor per character. Attached character gets +1 hit point.
Action: Choose a Dwarf hero.  That hero gets +2 Willpower +2 Attack and +2 Defense until the end of the round.
Response: After players quest unsuccessfully choose a player.  That player does not raise his threat.
Action: Choose a Dwarf character.  Until the end of the phase that character gets +3 Attack.
Action: Each Dwarf character gets +1 Willpower until the end of the phase. [+2 Willpower instead if the active location is an Underground or Dark location.]
Action: Exhaust a Dwarf character to place 2 progress tokens on the active location.  [4 progress tokens instead if it is an Underground or Mountain location.]
While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters Gloin gains: Response: After you play Gloin from your hand choose a hero. Add 2 resources to that heros resource pool.
While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters Bifur gains: Response: After you play Bifur from your hand draw 2 cards.
While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters lower the cost to play Dwalin by 2.

Attach to a hero with the printed Ranged keyword.
Restricted.
Combat Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Exhaust Great Yew Bow and attached hero to make a ranged attack against that enemy. Declare attached hero as the attacker. No other attackers can be declared for this attack.

Limit 1 per deck.
Attach to a hero with Ranged.
Response: After attached hero declares an attack add Black Arrow to the victory display to give attached hero +5 [Attack] for this attack.

Response: After a location is added to the staging area attach Thrors Key to that location. While attached to a location Thrors Key gains: Treat attached locations printed text box as blank except for traits.

Attach to a hero.
Response: After attached hero quests successfully name a card type and discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card is the named type take it into your hand.

Attach to a Dwarf hero.
Action: Exhaust King Under the Mountain to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the other.
Action: Exhaust a Weapon attachment to choos a non-unique enemy with 0 [Defense]. Discard the chosen enemy.
Action: Choose a hero you control. Until the end of the phase give control of that hero and all resouces in that heros resource pool to another player. [Limit 1 per phase]

Action: Exhaust a hero you control to shuffle the encounter decks and reveal [Erratad to look at] its top card. Place progress tokens on the current quest equal to the revealed cards [Threat]. Then put that card back on top of the encounter deck.
Action: If you control at least 1 Dwarf hero put a Dwarf ally from your discard pile into play under your control. Put that ally on the bottom of your deck at the end of a phase.

Action: Choose a character in play [other than Bilbo Baggins]. Add Bilbo Baggins total [Willpower] [Attack] and [Defense] to that characters [Willpower] [Attack] and [Defense] respectively until the end of the phase.
Response: After you play Fili from your hand during the planning phase search your deck for Kili and put him into play under your control. Then shuffle your deck.
Response: After you play Kili from your hand during the planning phase search your deck for Fili and put him into play under your control. Then shuffle your deck.
Action: Exhaust Bofur to search the top 5 cards of your deck for 1 Weapon attachment. Add that card to your hand and shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Response: After a hero is assigned any amount of damage exhaust Dori to place that damage on Dori instead.

Gandalf does not exhaust to commit to a quest.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase discard Gandalf from play. You may raise your threat by 2 to cancel this effect.
Attach to a hero. Action: Discard Cram to ready attached hero.
Action: Exhaust Spare Hood and Cloak and exhaust attached character to ready another character. Then attach Spare Hood and Cloak to that character.
Attach to a hero. Action: Exhaust Thrors Map to choose a location in the staging area. Make that location the active location. [If there is another active location return it to the staging area.]

Action: Exhaust 2 allies you control to shuffle your deck and discard the top 5 cards. Put up to 2 allies discarded by this effect into play under your control. The total cost of the allies put into play cannot exceed the total cost of the allies exhausted to pay for this effect.
Response: After a hero you control attacks and destroys an enemy exhaust a Weapon card attached to that hero to draw 3 cards.
Combat Action: Exhaust a Weapon card attached to a hero you control to choose an enemy engaged with you. Deal 2 damage to that enemy. [Deal 3 damage instead if the enemy is an Orc.]
Quest Action: Exhaust a character you control that is not committed to the quest to commit that character to the quest.

Play during the quest phase before the staging step.
Action: Deal 2 damage to the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck this phase.

Action: Bilbo Baggins gets +2 [Willpower] +2 [Attack] and +2 [Defense] until the end of the phase. [You may spend a [Baggins] resource from Bilbo Baggins resource pool to play this card even if you do not control Bilbo Baggins.]

Eagles of the Misty Mountains cannot have restricted attachments.  Eagles of the Misty Mountains gets +1 Attack and +1 Defense for each facedown attachment it has.
Response: After another Eagle character leaves play you may attach that card facedown to Eagles of the Misty Mountains.
Response: After you play West Road Traveller from your hand switch the active location with any other location in the staging area.
While Mirkwood Runner is attacking alone the defending enemy does not count its Defense.

Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains sentinel.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedains Signal to another hero.

Attach to a Tactics hero.
Action: Exhaust Support of the Eagles to choose an Eagle ally.  Until the end of the phase attached hero adds that allys Attack or Defense [choose 1] to its own.

Play after shadow cards have been dealt before any attacks have resolved.
Combat Action: Each player may choose and discard 1 facedown shadow card from an enemy with which he is engaged.
Action: Until the end of the phase all Rohan characters get +2 Willpower.
Action: Look at the top card of the encounter deck.  Then you may pay 1 Lore resource to return Rumour from the Earth to your hand.
Action: Move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck.

Action: Spend 1 Spirit resource to give control of Rider of the Mark to another player. [Limit once per round.]
Response: After Rider of the Mark changes control discard a shadow card dealt to an enemy you are engaged with.
Action: Exhaust Bombur to choose a location. That location gets   -1 Threat until the end of the phase. [That location does not contribute its Threat instead if it is an Underground location.]

Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character. Restricted.
When attached character attacks an enemy that enemy gets -2 Defense until the end of the phase.

Attach to a Spirit hero. Response: After Song of EÑrendil enters play draw 1 card.
Response: After another player raises his threat raise your threat by 1 to reduce that players threat by 1.
Action: Ready all Dwarf characters.
Action: Exhaust X characters to deal X damage to an enemy in the staging area.
Action: Search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for any 1 non-objective card worth no victory points and add it to your victory display. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Response: After a Dwarf character leaves play shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.
Action: Exhaust Master of the Forge to search the top 5 cards of your deck for any 1 attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Unique. Attach to a [Leadership] hero. Each Dwarf character gets +1 hit point.

Attach to a hero. Action: Discard Miruvor to [choose two]: ready attached hero add 1 resource to attached heros resource pool attached hero gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the round or put Miruvor on the top of your deck.

Attach to Elrond. He gains a [Spirit] resource icon.
Action: Exhaust Elrond and Vilya to reveal the top card of your deck. You can immediately play or put into play the revealed card for no cost if able. Otherwise move the revealed card to the bottom of your deck.
Action: Exhaust X Dwarf characters to add X resources to a heros resource pool and draw 1 card.
Action: Exhaust a character you control with ranged to immediately declare it as an attacker [and resolve its attack] against an enemy in the staging area. It gets +1 [Attack] during this attack.

Response: After an enemy attacks you put that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck. If your threat is lower than that enemys engagement cost set your threat equal to the engagement cost of that enemy.
Refresh Action: Exhaust 2 heroes to draw 5 cards.

Action: Look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. You may select 1 card and move it to the bottom of the encounter deck. Return any unselected cards to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

Lower the cost to play Bill the Pony by 2 if you control Sam Gamgee. Cannot have attachments.
Each Hobbit character gets +1 hit point.
If each hero you control has the Hobbit trait damage from undefended attacks against you may be assigned to Barliman Butterbur.
Response: After Farmer Maggot enters play deal 1 damage to an enemy engaged with you. [Deal 2 damage instead if that enemys engagement cost is highger than your threat.]

Attach to a Hobbit hero. Limit 1 per hero.
Attached hero gets +2 [Defense] while defending against an attack made by an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat.

Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gets +1 [Attack] [+2 [Attack instead if attacking an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat].

Attach to a Hobbit. Limit 1 per character.
Response: After your threat is reduced by an event card effect exhaust Hobbit Pipe to draw a card.

Attach to the active location. Attached location gets +1 quest point. 
Response: After attached location leaves play as an explored location the first player puts 1 ally into play from his hand.

Setup: Attach to the Ring-bearer.
Action: Add Mr. Underhill to the victory display to choose an enemy engaged with you. Until the end of the round that enemy cannot attack you.

Setup: Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 [Defense] and gains the Ranger trait.

Setup: Attach to a hero. 
Attached hero gets +2 hit points and gains the Healer trait.

Setup: Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 [Attack] and gains the Warrior trait.

Setup: Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 [Willpower] and gains the Noble trait.
Action: Choose a Hobbit character. That character gets +2 [Willpower] +2 [Attack] and +2 [Defense] until the end of the phase.
Action: Reduce your threat by 1 for each Pipe you control. Each hero with a Pipe attachment gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the phase.

Lower the cost to play Take No Notice by 1 for each Hobbit or Ranger hero you control.
Action: Add 5 to each enemys engagement cost until the end of the round.
Action: Each hero you control gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the round. Draw 1 card for each Hobbit hero you control.
Response: After Squire of the Citadel leaves play add 1 resource to a Gondor heros resource pool.

If there is at least 1 Rohan hero in play lower the cost to play Guthlaf by 1.
If there is at least 1 Gondor hero in play Guthlaf gains sentinel.

Action: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck to put Emery into play from your hand under any players control. Then if any of the discarded cards have the [Tactics] [Lore] or [Leadership] sphere discard Emery.
Action: Exhaust Anborn to return 1 Trap card from your discard pile to your hand.

Attach to a [Leadership] hero. 
Reduce the cost to play Tome of Atanator by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Leadership] resource icon.
Action: Discard Tome of Atanator to play any [Leadership] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then place that event on the bottom of your deck.

Play Poisoned Stakes into the staging area unattached.
If unattached attach Poisoned Stakes to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
At the end of each round deal 2 damage to attached enemy.
Encounter Action: Engage each enemy in play.
Action: Choose a Silvan or Noldor ally you control. That ally gets +2 [Willpower] until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase shuffle that ally into its owner?s deck if it is still in play.
Action: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. You may attach 1 attachment card discarded by this effect to an eligible Dwarf character in play.
Response: Discard Dunedain Watcher from play to cancel the shadow effects of a card just triggered.

Vassal of the Windlord cannot have restricted attachments.
Forced: After an attack in which Vassal of the Windlord attacked resolves discard Vassal of the Windlord from play.
While Elfhelm is ready he gains:Response: After your threat is raised as the result of questing unsuccessfully or by an encounter or quest card effect reduce your threat by 1.
Response: After a Silvan character readies during the refresh phase heal 1 damage from that character.

Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains ranged.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Cache to another hero.

Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust Song of Mocking to choose another hero.  Until the end of the phase attached hero takes all damage assigned to the chosen hero.

Attach to a Hobbit character.
Action: Exhaust Fast Hitch to ready attached character.
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Tactics resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase Rohan characters do not exhaust to commit to quests.
While you control Outlands allies that belong to 4 different spheres ready Forlong at the beginning of each phase.
Forced: After a character leaves play discard Silvan Refugee from play.
Response: After a card effect adds any number of resources to the resource pool of a hero you control Harbor Master gains +1 [Defense] until the end of the round.
If each hero you control belongs to the same sphere of influence you may assign damage from undefended enemy attacks to the White Tower Watchman instead of a hero you control.

Attach to a [Tactics] hero. Limit 1 per hero.
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy deal 1 damage to another enemy that shares a Trait with the enemy just destroyed.

Play only if each hero you control has a printed [Leadership] resource icon.
Action: Ready each ally in play.

Play only if each hero you control has a printed [Tactics] resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase if the current quest has no keyword it gains battle.
[Characters quest using [Attack] instead of [Willpower].]

Play only if each hero y ou control has the printed [Spirit] resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase [Spirit] characters use their [Willpower] instead of [Defense].

Play only if each hero you control has a printed [Lore] resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase enemies do not make engagement checks.

Response: After Keen-eyed Took enters play reveal the top card of each players deck.
Action: Return Keen-eyed Took to your hand to discard the top card of each players deck.

Descendant of Thorondor cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After Descendant of Thorondor enters or leaves play deal 2 damage to any 1 enemy in the staging area.
Action: Exhaust and discard The Riddermarks Finest to place 2 progress tokens on any location.
Action: Exhaust Gildor Inglorion to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card from your hand. Then return the 3 cards to the top of your deck in any order.
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Spirit resource icon.
Quest Action: Discard a Leadership ally to give each hero committed to this quest +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.
Action: Choose an Eagle ally.  Return that character to its owners hand.
Action: Discard a Rohan ally to choose a location. Place 3 progress tokens on that location.

Play during the Quest phase before characters are committed to the Quest.
Action: Reveal 1 less card from the encounter deck this phase. [To a minimum of 1.]
Action: Choose and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card. [Limit once per round.]
Erebor Battle Master gets +1 [Attack] for each other Dwarf character you control.
Action: Exhaust Warden of Healing to heal 1 damage on up to 2 different characters. Then you may pay 2 [Lore] resources to ready Warden of Healing.
Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character. Restricted. Attached character gets +1 hit point and +1 [Defense].
Attach to a Dwarf character. Response: After you travel to a Mountain or Underground location ready attached character and reduce your threat by 1.
Attach to a [Lore] hero. Limit 1 per hero. Response: After a Song card is played add 1 resource to attached heros resource pool.
Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area deal 1 damage to that enemy. Players ignore that enemy while making engagement checks this round.
Action: Enemies engaged with you cannot attack this phase.
Action: Exhaust an Istari character to search your deck for 1 card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
Response: After Pelargir Ship Captain enters play move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another heros resource pool.
Response: After Ered Nimrais Prospector enters play discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then choose and shuffle 1 card from your discard pile back into your deck.

Attach to a Gondor hero.
While attached hero has at least 1 resource in its resource pool Gondor characters get +1 [Willpower].

Attach to a Rohan character. Restricted.
Attached character gets +1 [Attack]. [+2 [Attack] instead if attacking an enemy in the staging area].

Attach to a Gondor or Rohan hero.
Response: After attached hero commits to a quest spend 1 resource from attached heros resource pool to ready attached hero.

Attach to a [Lore] hero.
Reduce the cost to play Scroll of Isildur by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Lore] resource icon.
Action: Discard Scroll of Isildur to play any [Lore] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then place that event on the bottom of your deck.
Combat Action: Each Rohan hero can be declared as an attacker against enemies in the staging area this phase.
Action: Choose a [Spirit] hero. Until the end of the phase that hero gets +1 [Willpower] for each resource in its resource pool.

Response: After Hidden Cache is discarded from your deck add 2 resources to the resource pool of a hero you control.
Action: Spend 1 resource to draw 1 card.

Quest Action: Spend 1 Spirit resource to put Bofur into play from your hand exhausted and committed to a guest.  If you quest successfully this phase and Bofur is still in play return him to your hand.
Action: Exhaust Ravenhill Scout to move up to 2 progress tokens from 1 location to another location.

Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero gets +1 Attack for each resource token on another copy of Keeping Count that is above the current number of resource tokens on this card.    Forced: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy place 1 resource token on this card.
Attach to a Hobbit hero. Action: Discard Good Meal to lower the cost of the next event you play this round that matches attached heros sphere by 2.
Action: Discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded cards printed cost is equal to or higher than the number of characters you control draw 2 cards and deal 2 damage to any enemy.
Action: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and put 1 revealed ally into play if able. Shuffle all other revealed cards back into your deck.
Action: Choose a character you control.  Until the end of the phase that character gets +3 Attack while attacking an enemy with a higher engagement cost than your threat.
Response: After another player plays an attachment on a hero you control you may [choose 1]: ready 1 of that players heroes have that player draw 1 card or lower that players threat by 2.
Action: Raise your threat by 1 to look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then reduce your threat by X where X is the threat of that card.
Each Outlands character you control gets +1 [Defense]
Each Outlands character you control gets +1 [Attack]
Each Outlands character you control gets +1 [Willpower]
Each Outlands character you control gets +1 hit point.

Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Limit 1 per hero.
Attached hero gains +1 [Defense]. [+2 [Defense] instead if attached hero has the Gondor trait.]

Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 hit points for each Artifact attachment attached to it.
If attached hero is Aragorn he also gains a [Lore] resource icon.
Action: Discard 2 resources from your heros resource pool to add 3 resources to that heros resource pool.
Action: Draw 1 card for each hero you control with a printed [Lore] resource icon.
Action: Name a sphere. Until the end of the phase you can spend resources of any sphere when paying for cards that belong to the named sphere.

At the end of the round discard Saruman from play.
Response: After Saruman enters play choose a non-unique enemy or location in the staging area. While Saruman is in play the chosen enemy or location is considered to be out of play.
Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword read Orthanc Guard.
Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword Isengard Messenger gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the round. [Limit twice per round.]
Action: Discard Westfold Outrider to choose an enemy not engaged with you. Engage the chosen enemy.
Response: After Westfold Horse-breeder enters play search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Mount attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Attach to a [Tactics] or Rohan hero. Restricted.
Response: After attached hero participates in an attack that destroys an enemy exhaust Rohan Warhorse to read attached hero.

Attach to a [Spirit] hero.
While attached hero is ready shadow cards dealt to enemies engaged with you are dealt face up. [Shadow card effects are still resolved when resolving enemy attacks.]

Attach to a hero.
Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword exhaust Keys of Orthanc to add 1 resource to attached hero?s resource pool.
Action: Add 1 resource to each heros resource pool.
Action: Each player draws 2 cards.
Action: Each player chooses 1 enemy engaged with him. Until the end of the phase each chosen enemy cannot attack the player that chose it.
Action: Each player may choose and discard a Condition attachment from play.

Action: Search your deck for a card with the Doomed keyword and add it to your hand. 
Shuffle your deck.

Watcher of the Bruinen does not exhaust to defend.
Forced: After Watcher of the Bruinen defends either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.
Response: After Arwen Und¢miel exhausts choose a character. That character gains sentinel and gets +1 Defense until the end of the round.
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Leadership resource icon. If attached hero is Aragorn each character you control gets +1 Willpower.

Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character or to Aragorn.
Limit 1 per character.
Attached character gains ranged. If attached character has a printed ranged keyword it gets +1 Attack during a ranged attack.

Attach to a Dwarf hero.
Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand draw 1 card.

Attach to a hero you control.
Attached hero collects 1 additional resource during the resource phase each round.
Response: After a character leaves play add its Defense to another characters Defense until the end of the round.
Action: If you control a unique Noldor character give another character +1 Willpower until the end of the phase and lower your threat by 3.
Response: After a location enters play exhaust a Hobbit character to shuffle that location back into the encounter deck. Then reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.
